metadata.name: Visions of the Infinity #01
metadata.description:
This artwork, generated through 3D software, represents a meticulous experimentation with the bending and deforming of light, the light deformed by a transparent object, and the emotional effects it provides. For this artwork, I reduced objects and volumes to the minimum possible, and let the light to be protagonist. Light is distorted, refracted and bent, and this deformed version of light interacts with the space around- revealing it and some sense also deforming it. 


NFT resolution: 2000 x 2400 pixeles
Signed physical print: 100 x 120 cm (39,3 x 47,2 inch). Claimable by the NFT holder. Contact the artist for more information.
